faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Everything you need to know about our AI creation platform

0.question: What is Picoo?
0.answer: Picoo is an all-in-one AI creation platform that integrates top AI models like Veo and Gemini. We provide professional AI video generation and image generation services, making AI creation accessible to everyone.

1.question: Is there a free trial?
1.answer: Yes! We offer daily free quota for all users. You can start creating immediately without a credit card. No hidden fees or commitments required.

2.question: Which AI models do you support?
2.answer: We integrate leading AI models including Veo for video generation, Gemini for advanced AI capabilities, and various image generation models. We continuously add new models to provide the best creation experience.

3.question: How long does it take to generate content?
3.answer: Generation time varies by model and content type. Image generation typically takes 10-30 seconds, while video generation may take 1-5 minutes depending on length and complexity.

4.question: Can I use generated content commercially?
4.answer: Yes, content generated on our paid plans can be used for commercial purposes. Please check our Terms of Service for specific usage rights and licensing details.

5.question: What payment methods do you accept?
5.answer: We accept all major credit cards, debit cards, and various online payment methods. Your payment information is securely processed through industry-standard encryption.
